14413221.content:
A girl, little to others if not you, loomed over you as you squirmed in her firm grip, her hands soft as putty. Taking in her features, she appeared a few years younger than you, two years younger, you figured. Her face was round like a cherub, her hair short, laying like an upside-down bowl on her head. Her glasses were black with a thick frame, they made her appear older than she was. Under her free arm was a thin, hardback book, likely some picture book. The giantess cocked her head to one side, before speaking in a soft voice.

"...What are you...?" She sounded shy, to the point you weren't certain she'd keep her composure if you responded. Then again, to most anyone who wasn't a dumb kid, a doll moving and talking like a normal person was a bit out of place, to say the least. Still, you figured it best to speak up and dispel any false conclusions she might draw before they get too concrete in her mind.

"Um, hi."

The girl startled, dropping her book and nearly dropping you as her free hand jumped to her mouth, her green eyes wide, starkly contrasting the half-moon they simulated earlier. A teacher, noticing her jump, spoke at her as she wrangled one of the more rambunctious toddlers. "Ellie, are you alright?"

The girl, not taking her bespectacled eyes off of you, responded sheepishly. "Uh, y-ye-... Mm-hm!" Was what she finally decided on. Not waiting to hear if the daycare attendant was going to ask anything else, Ellie pushed you into her chest with both hands and ran off to the reading corner, a relatively quiet and undisturbed space in the large room, its contents apparently not appealing to the younger kids, of which they were the majority.

Sitting down on a beanbag chair, she released you, allowing you small comfort from being chafed against the polymer of her thin, purple blouse. Looking down at you with an intensity you would have guessed impossible for the young girl to muster, she spoke, hushed, but clearly. "What are you? Are you..."

"My name is Tony, and I'm a kid like you, a little older though, I'm seven."

To your surprise, her eyes lit up with recognition. "You're Tony? The teachers talked about you..." Your surprise compounded. The teachers? Just how far in advance did Mom plan to dump me here? You wondered. She continued. "To be honest, I was looking forward to it. You were so old, you've already started school! I also hoped you liked to read too..." She stared out at all of the tykes running around, making noise one way or another- laughing, crying, screaming, singing....

"W-well, Ellie, right? I am Tony, that's me, but I'm normally bigger." Your heart pounded, like a fist hammering the inside of your chest. She was younger, but still massive! You weren't even the size of a regular doll, maybe half at best. When she held you in her tiny hand, your legs didn't even reach the bottom of her fist, even when only your head was exposed. She was the size of a building to you, at any point, even accidentally, she could squish you. She didn't seem like that kind of girl, but still, just the thought made you nervous. Despite all of that, you continued, knowing no better way out of your predicament. "Um, Ellie, I was hoping for help getting bigger. Could you..."

She cut you off. "Oh, I've heard of it. Shrinking. There was a boy before you that I heard about, he was eight, I think."

"Oh, that's nice- Wait, did you say someone else shrank too!? Who? When?" You demanded of her, forgetting your size differences for the moment.

The girl recoiled from your demands, leaning back, and causing you to fall on her flat belly. The fabric of her shirt provided the traction needed to keep from rolling down, potentially into her pants. "P-please calm down! It- it was a long time ago, I was here, but I was still a baby."

Leaning up off your back on her belly, you took to your feet, and ran up her chest. Her shirt proved for awkward footing, causing you to fall occasionally, but you doggedly made your way to just under her head, where you were still visible, near her clavicle. "Please, Ellie, tell me everything you know about it!"

The girl blushed, seeing the tiny boy scramble so desperately up her was a strange sight, one that tickled her in a way she didn't understand, but ignored for the time being. "W-well, I don't know the whole story, Tony." She gently scooped you into the flat of her palm before seating herself more upright. Holding you at an angle that was easier on her neck, she continued speaking to you. "Granny told me that story."

"Your grandma? She works here?"

Ellie looked down, the light catching her lens and hiding her eyes from view as she did so. "...No, she's not my granny, I just call her that. She's the oldest lady who works here, but she's really nice, but doesn't come in very often anymore...."

"You mean... She's not here?" The five-year-old shook her head, blonde locks dancing along her visage as she did so. "...Darn. Well, guess I'll just have to wait for my Mom then. Ellie, I need to stay with you."
14413221.title: A quiet, giant little girl

144132211.content:
"H-huh? You... Want to stay with me?" She asked you incredulously. Her blush returned, cheeks pink at the thought.

"Well, yeah. You're the best kid here, I've already had my time with them." You gesture to the mosh pit of toddlers tearing around. She smiles, but it fades as quickly as it came.

"Well, I normally leave pretty early, Mommy- ...My Mom normally comes by soon. And, if you want to come home with me, that's OK, but there's another thing...." Her pink blush began to darken to red. Before you could inquire as to what this odd stipulation could be, the devil spoken of made its appearance.

"Elizabeth! Mother's here to pick you up, hurry up out of your corner and come here."

Facing away, she shouted back. "Uh- Uh-huh, c-c-coming!" Ellie looked down to you, an apologetic look on her face. "I-I'm sorry, there's nowhere else!-"

Before you could inquire as to what she could mean, you felt the surface where you sat drop out from under you. Your stomach rose in your gut as your hair billowed in the wind, your free-fall so sudden you didn't even have time to shout. You couldn't even wonder if she just condemned you to death by falling before a soft, warm... Something caught you. It felt like a trampoline, but softer. Everything happened to fast to fathom, as to you one second you were in her hand looking up at her as she made a face, the next you were sealed somewhere warm, soft, and slightly smelly.

Outside, Ellie held an enclosed hand to her mouth as she looked down at the waistband of her jeans. As she was wondering if you were alright, if you were OK with what it would take to smuggle you home, her mother called once more.

"Elizabeth! It's not polite to keep your mother waiting!"

"S-sorry Mommy- Eep! M-Mom..." She hoped she didn't hear the first part as she obediently and awkwardly trotted over, careful not to chafe her passenger.

"Now now, you know the drill, you're too old for toys. Empty your pockets!"

Ellie complied, turning them inside out, pinching her legs together to keep you from squirming too much and revealing your presence. Satisfied, the woman grabbed her hand and began to drag her to the car. Before they made it to the door, the worker that called to her earlier waved at her.

"Hey, Greta should be here tomorrow! I'm sure she'll be happy to see you Ellie!"

The young girl lit up before being pulled through the door, toward the car leading home.

Ellie climbed into the back seat, strapping herself into the carseat just as her mother had taught her to. Feeling her guest squirming in her panties, she pinched her thighs together to cease them, whispering a silent apology as she did so. Her head shot up at her mother's voice.

"Now Elizabeth, I'm certain you know the standard, yes? I expect to have at minimum three paragraphs detailing what you did today, one for every hour, understood?"

"Yes Mother..." Came her doleful reply.

"Speak up!" Her mother barked. Then, calmer, "I'm sorry you still have to go to that detestable daycare, if your father were still around perhaps things would be different, but unfortunately until they finally acknowledge that you're ready for school, we both have to put up with it." As Ellie felt a familiar squirming between her legs, she shuffled slightly in her seat, hoping to give Tony some relief. But honestly, interesting things happened at the daycare, and there were interesting people too. She got to enjoy herself, the daycare was a wonderful place where she was free from-
She stopped herself. No, she thought, those are bad thoughts. I can't think that way, Mommy- Mother will be unhappy.

"...I had you potty-trained and out of diapers at one year and four months! Elizabeth, tell me how many months that is."

"...Sixteen months Mother."

"Very good, sixteen months. The average child is out of diapers at what age?"

"...Two to three years Mother."

"Ah, it was, but the statistics have updated, changed. Now it's from three to four years, that means that you were potty-trained in nearly a quarter of the time as the average child. Hm, it's unlike you to give me an incorrect answer, especially so early into your fifth year.

"But Mom- Mother, I was close!"

"Close? Close isn't good enough, if you aren't right, you're wrong, and being one off is as bad as a thousand off! That daycare is clearly a bad influence." She trailed off, grumbling as she tuned the radio to the news.

Ellie sat quietly, retreating into her own head, silent until they had arrived at their home. Ellie unlatched herself and jumped out, before facing her mother.

"Now Elizabeth, time to..."

1531222221111.content:
Seeing her hand illuminated by the outside world, you run as fast as you can along the sopping-wet floor. The massive hand gropes aimlessly, the owner apparently unconcerned at the dampness it's accumulating. When you get in reach, you trip over yourself in your desperation, falling into the soft palm of your five-year-old warden. She, feeling you, gently curled her hand around you, and pulled you free. She smiles as she looks down on you resting in the palm of her hand.

"What the heck!? I was just in your diaper, then you take me out, then you put me back in!?"

The girl giggles as your outburst, apparently finding it adorable. "Sorry~"

You begin to shout again, but calm yourself. She could be the best chance you've got. With a sigh, you look down on the smooth, soft skin of her palm, before returning your gaze to her imposing, but friendly visage. "Listen, what's your name? Mine's Tony."

As she sits, she smiles. "Wow, so tiny peopul have names too?"

"Well, I'm not a tiny person, at least I'm not supposed to be. I'm seven, my mom dropped me off here and I shrank."

"Wow, you can shrink!? How did you do tat?"

"I don't know, I didn't mean to, I need to get big again, please, I need your help."

The colossal girl sighed, the wind rushing past you knocking you to your bum. "OK OK, here, I'll go ask..." She relented as she began to pull open her pull-up with a free hand.

"Wait wait wait!!" You shouted as she began to tilt her palm.

"What? I don't wanna lose you."

"I- that's- that's your diaper!"

"Hee hee, of course silly, I carry all my things in dere, I don't have pockets."

"But you peed!"

The girl tilted her head like you told her the sky was pink. "Um, yeah. That's what diapers are for. You're kinda dumb, aren't you?" She giggled once more, her diaper snapping shut as she covered her mouth.

"ME!? I'm not the five-year-old who still pees herself like a baby!!" You shouted with anger. This was stupid, you thought. You shouldn't even be here, you're way too old for daycare, and the kid closest in age to you still wore pull-ups!

After your rant, the girl gasped, her eyes beginning to shimmer. "You- I'm not a b-baby! *Hic!* You meanie..." The girl was on the verge of full-blown tears, quickly you began to run damage control.

"I-I'm sorry! I'm sorry, you're not a baby, you're a big girl! You're a really big girl, you're so big! That's why I need your help!" The girl sniffled, eyes still wet, but tears not yet flowing.

"Y-you really tink so?"

"Yes, yes please, I need your help, um... I don't think you told me your name."

Wiping her eyes, her voice began to even out. "Susie."

"Susie, you're the biggest girl ever. Please help me."

"Ok... But you need to go in my diaper then."

"Susie- Ergh...." She hadn't tried to eat you, step on you, or use you as a toy, so she was the best option, but if you never saw another diaper again, much less smelled one...

"No diaper, no help."

"Fine, fine, but you're still wet, please get changed, then I'll..." You sighed. "Then I'll go in your diaper..."

Susie looked down on your sulking form, then her pull-up, then back to you. "...OK. But where can I hide you in the meantime...?"
1531222221111.title: Let her pick you up

15312222211111.content:
"OK, I'll go get changed. You ready? Ahh..." Pinching your leg, vertigo hit you with a rush of blood as you felt yourself lifted faster and further than was probably safe, your fears confirmed when your vision cleared and the girl's mouth lay open in front of you, strands and bubbles of saliva reflecting the light above. Waving your arms in panic, you screamed.

"Susie! Susie, no! Don't eat me, you said you'd help me! Susie!" Your heart felt like it was going to explode, knowing that the second this five-year-old loosened her fingers you would be as a piece of candy. Thankfully, Susie must have heard you, as you felt yourself lowered slightly. Now eye-to-eye to the tyke, her voice vibrated you through her fingers.

"I'm not gonna eat you, silly! I just need to keep you close, and if you wont go into my diaper until it's dry..." She lifted you once again, the act completing her statement.

"Susie, please! Please don't, Susie-!" This time ignoring your protestations, her fingers opened and down you plummetted, tears streaking your cheeks as you screamed. You screamed with terror and a hint of fury, what had you done to deserve this? Your body uncomfortably bent as you landed face-first on the girl's slimy, surprisingly smooth tongue. By the time you opened your eyes, you were enclosed in darkness, your life in the maw of a little girl.

Susie giggled, suckling the tiny boy in her mouth. Swishing him side to side as if he were a candy, she decided that he didn't taste very good. Puckering her lips and frowning, she shrugged her shoulders and, pretending to be an airplane, "flew" over to the changing station.

The older lady, with a bored glance, acknowledged her presence. "What is it, do you need a change sweetie?" She sighed. Susie confirmed by nodding her head and lifting her sundress innocently. "Alright, lie there." Lazily grabbing a fresh pull-up, she began the change, before her attention was caught by the normally talkative girl's silence, and the tell-tale "swish-swish" of something being sucked on.

"...Susie, do you have something in your mouth?" Susie froze, before vehemently shaking her head. The daycare attendant opened her mouth to call her out, but after noticing she was a few short minutes away from shift change decided not to bother with it. Concluding the change, Susie was fresh as a daisy and ushered back into the play area. Walking over to the attendance log, she gave it a cursory glance before tossing it aside and clocking out, missing the "A" for absent next to Tony's name.

Susie, feeling wonderful in a fresh pull-up, skipped back to the spout where she found the tiny boy. Cupping her hands beneath her chin, she let him out with an exaggerated "blegh!"

It felt as if you were vomited back into the world, your soaking skin, thick and cloying your souvenir of your ordeal.

"There we go! See, promised I wouldn't eat you! Though that was pretty funny, you screamed so loud! Do I scare you so bad? Rawr!" With one hand, she pulled it into a claw, as she playfully roared at you.

Trying to wipe away her spit, you were caught off-guard when she roared at you, her massive face looming even closer, and her maw once again open. Freezing, you began to stammer.

"S-Susie, wh-why are you- *hic!* Why... Why..." You were choking it back as hard as you could, to the point where it began to hurt. tears began mixing with cooling saliva as you fought a losing battle against the floodgates. The feeling of being so helpless, so powerless, of being treated so carelessly by someone who promised to help, all of it overpowered the shame of crying in front of a girl younger than you, and you began to bawl.

You howled with misery, with helplessness, why, why did this happen to me, you cried, please someone help me, please, help me!

Susie was caught off guard by the volume you were managing to create. Looking around to make sure no one was close enough to hear, she tried to console you by...

1532221121111111111112.content:
You thought you were prepared for it, as much as you could be for such a thing; Small enough to fit in a girl half your age's diaper and having room enough to stand. A flood of pee, a mudslide of poop, or a hurricane of both, as the overactive toddler joyfully played, danced, jumped, and ran around with her fellows with you still in the pit of despair. The smell of both was there, but neither came, as you instead found yourself contending with a different problem altogether.

It was Summer, but a pleasantly warm day. At the bottom of the overactive little girl's diaper however, where you lay, it was sweltering. Sweat gushed from your pores, each breath ragged from the heat, despite the sour humidity of the uncirculated air. Soon enough, your sweat was washed away by hers, large, salty drops splashing heavily on your back as you laid belly-flat against the polymer growing soggier beneath you. Your throat hurt, desperate for water, and despite feeling as though you were swimming, you had none to drink.

Despite the conditions you suffered in, the girl was blissfully unaware of it, simply enjoying the exertion she was feeling, able to run around and be as hyper as she desired without fear of a reprimanding from her parent.

You felt yourself losing strength, as each minute passed, more agonizing than the last. At one point you held your mouth open for a drop of sweat, and as it burst over your face, you nearly vomited out what little made it into your mouth. It was like gargling seawater, but worse, considering the general vicinity from whence it came.

You hadn't banged or tried hitting her legs for fear that tickling would lead to peeing, but now you were too weak to do so, slipping into and out of consciousness from the heat.

After an unknown amount of time passed, you felt pressed between her wet skin and the sopping diaper floor beneath you. You wondered if she peed, but it didn't smell like it, it must have been the sweat that caused her diaper to expand.

Despite practically drowning, you felt desiccated, like a mummy. If you didn't get out of here soon, you feared you wouldn't wake up again!
1532221121111111111112.title: Plays with the other toddlers

choices: Getting to know Jessie in the car
15322211211111111111121.content:
The mother chuckled, seeing her young daughter run delighted with the other children. As she fanned herself, she wondered how the little girl managed it.

After a few minutes, she saw that the toddler wasn't completely immune to the heat. Her shirt was getting wet from her sweat, but more noticeably than that, her diaper was becoming swollen, most likely for the same reason as her shirt.

"Jessie sweetie, come here!" The girl obediently did so, well-behaved as she was. "Come here sweaty, let's get you changed, OK?"

"But I didn't pee, mommy!" The girl covered the front of her diaper, as if she could keep it out of reach.

"I'm sure you didn't, but it's nearly time for us to go, and it's all yucky and full of sweat!" The mother explained, losing a bit of patience. Thankfully, the girl didn't object further, though she knew she shouldn't get changed, but couldn't remember why. The two went to the changing room, and when the sodden diaper released it's hold on her waist, she remembered why as her mother pulled free the reason.

"What is- sweetie, don't put dolls in your diaper, OK? That's yucky." You were limp in the woman's grasp. Salvation had arrived, and you couldn't even cry out, so weak you were from your imprisonment.

"It's not yucky, I wasn't gonna potty on him, and he's not a doll, he's a tiny boy, I was keeping him safe!" The girl sat up, reaching out for you.

The mother looked at you, and to your despair sighed as she handed you back to her daughter, unbelieving of your true nature. "OK OK, whatever you say. But don't keep "him" in your diaper anymore, OK? "He" probably doesn't like it. Now lie back down, I need to get a clean diaper on you."

The mother finished the change with you resting uselessly in the girl's soft grip. Carrying you like a doll despite speaking out against this false association before, the girl skipped to the car as you started to be able to move and speak.

You also think to yourself that this is great place to hide. You cover your ears as the girl squeals loudly, just before she hugs tge bear to her. Your crushed between her and the soft body of the bear. You sigh in relief as she lets go of the bear and you can breath again. Your flung around the pocket as she plays with the bear and just hope she does look in the pocket or notice something is it it.
153222112111111111122212111.title: The bear

choices: In a gift bag for a kid

Digging your hands into the diaper as much as you could you slowed down the process of falling, but the boy jumped and the impact finished breaking you free. With a scream you fall towards the floor, only for the boy to start running, and you end up kicked across the room. You bounce off the wall and land....
153222112111111111122213.title: Slipping and coming unstuck

She starts to untape the diaper as your struggle with all your might with no luck. "Please no!"You scream as she takes the diaper off and balls it up with you. She starts to head toward the.....
15322211211111112.title: Your stuck..

153222112111111121.content: She walks up to the Garbage compactor and throws in the dirty diaper, you helplessly scream "No, NO, NO!!!!!!" She can't hear you as she starts the compactor, slowly the room in the machine gets smaller and smaller the air around you gets thicker and thicker. Then your body gets pinned between the dirty diaper and the wall, you are stuck there as the spaces continues to get smaller, you feel your body ache as your crushed. Soon your bones start to shatter under the pressure, and you are turned into a small bloody stain on a used diaper. Outside the woman waits for the machine to finish before taking out the remains and throwing them, and your remains, away in the trash.
153222112111111121.title: Garbage compactor, no chance of survival

choices: get stuck between her leg and diaper

"Being stuck to a wet diaper is... Wait did I just move." The saliva has loosened after getting wet, and your sliding down the diaper, now you can get free. "Yes just a little more and I'm free of this diaper." Your feet touch the car seat, and you push forward, landing on your knees. "Yes! I'm free. Know to figure out how to get the moms attention so I can get back home and get help."

Her diaper alone outsized you 10/1. The baby girl gets up and walks away unknowing that you're even there. You could try to escape the room, or you could stay and wait for an adult.

Time seems to go by so slowly for you, you can't rest for a second or it might mean losing a possible chance of catching a ride and possibly getting found. After a long 20 minutes, well at least to you, you start to hear a noise.

info.brief_description: Being a 7 year old in daycare is bad, shrinking is worst
info.description:
You play Tony,a young 7 year old boy. Your mother has placed you in a daycare for toddlers for the day, you have no idea why. And if things weren't bad enough you start to shrink. Are the kids nice or mean? That's for u to decide.

Rules:
1.Keep the majority of the interactions to the kids at the daycare and u.

2.Don't kill him off, if u have to,by just smashing him. Be a little more creative.

3.He can die, as stated before, but it takes quite a bit so don't be afraid to go into detail.

4.Details details details! Don't say stuff like it smelt bad or he screamed in pain cause it hurt. Add details.

5.The age of the kids at the daycare range from 5 to 2 and may wear either pull ups or diapers.

6.Don't leave only one option. Same goes for leaving many options that are exactly the same.

Follow these rules please and have fun.

Edit: I save the right to edit or delete chapters if rules are not followed. If edited please don't take offense, it was most likely edited because of a small rule violation or it was a little hard to read. If deleted please do not repost it, it was deleted for a reason. If I delete 3 chapters from one user in a short period of time I will no longer allow them to add chapters, sorry but those are my rules. If they are not to your liking post in another story.
